verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My Jesus, my Savior Lord there’s none like You. All of my days I want to praise The wonders of Your mighty love. My comfort, my shelter Tower of refuge and strength Let every breath, all that I am Never cease to worship You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shout to the Lord All the earth let us sing Power and majesty, praise to the King. Mountains bow down and the seas will roar At the sound of Your name. I sing for joy at the works of Your hands Forever I’ll love You Forever I’ll stand. Nothing compares to the promise I have in You.{/lang-eng}
